Summary: Add employee with mandatory fields only (Valid data, no Login Details, no profile picture)
Precondition: User is logged in, has "Add Employee" permission and in the PIM module page
Test description:
1. Click the add button
2. Fill all mandatory fields with valid data
3. Click Save button
Expected results:
- Employee record is created succesfully and visible in the employee list
- User is prompted to employee Personal Details page
Notes: UI changed color pallete after adding new user

Summary: Add employee with missing mandatory fields
Precondition: User is logged in, has "Add Employee" permission and in the PIM module page
Test description:
1. Click the add button
2. Leave name field empty
3. Click Save button
Expected results:
- Validation message appears under "First Name" and "Last Name" fields
- No employee is created with prompted Employee Id

Summary: Add employee with already existent Employee ID
Precondition: User is logged in, has "Add Employee" permission and in the PIM module page
Test description:
1. Click the add button
2. Fill all mandatory fields with valid data
3. Change newly created Employee Id with already existent Id
3. Click Save button
Expected results:
- Validation message appears under Employee Id
- User is unable to add new employee

Summary: Add employee with valid data, login Details and profile picture
Precondition: User is logged in, has "Add Employee" permission and in the PIM module page
Test description:
1. Click the add button
2. Fill all mandatory fields with valid data
3. Create Login Details with valid data
3. Click Save button
Expected results:
- Employee record is created succesfully and visible in the employee list
- User is prompted to employee Personal Details page
- User is able to login using newly created credentials

Summary: Add employee with valid data and invalid login Details
Precondition: User is logged in, has "Add Employee" permission and in the PIM module page
Test description:
1. Click the add button
2. Fill all mandatory fields with valid data
3. Create Login Details with invalid data (invalid password and username)
3. Click Save button
Expected results:
- Employee record is not created
- Validation message appears under specified field prompting requirements for correct data input

Precondition: User is logged in, has "Add Employee" permission and in the PIM module page
Test description:
1. Click the add button
2. Fill all mandatory fields with valid data
3. Click Cancel button
Expected results:
- Employee record is not created 
- User is prompted to PIM page

Summary: Edit employee details with valid data
Precondition: User is logged, has editing permissions and in the PIM screen. Employee record exists
Test description:
1. Open existing employee profile
2. Edit any personal details field (Nationality, Date of Birth, etc)
3. Click Save
Expected results: Changes in employee information are saved and show after refreshing employe page

Summary: Edit employee details with invalid data
Precondition: User is logged, has editing permissions and in the PIM screen. Employee record exists
Test description:
1. Open existing employee profile
2. Edit any personal details field with invalid data (eg. wrong date of Birth format, etc)
3. Click Save
Expected results:
- Validation message appears under invalid input
- Changes in employee record are not saved

Precondition: User is logged, has editing permissions and in the PIM screen. Employee record exists
Test description:
1. Open existing employee profile
2. Click profile picture and change picture when promtped
3. Click Save
Expected results: Changes in profile picture are saved

Precondition: User is logged in, has employee deletion permission and in the PIM module page
Test description:
1. Click Delete button on an employee profile
2. Confirm deletion when prompted
Expected results:
- Employee is deleted
- Previously accessed employee page information is no longer accesible

Precondition: User is logged in, has employee deletion permission and in the PIM module page
Test description:
1. Click Delete button on an employee profile
2. Abort deletion when prompted
Expected results: Employee profile deletion is aborted and no changes are made to his profile
